posts.post_content: I think it's good if the listing is legit.

[quote name="Econteachert205" post=1787740]I think it's good if the listing is legit.[/QUOTE]

Me too...
To the OP....on an ongoing auction it might be best to PM someone rather than post about it, IF the auction is still going. I guess that is only if you are interested in it because there will be a lot more eyes on it if you post about it. That all said, there are no rules concerning talking about open or closed auctions. Good luck in the hunt, the card looks like a good buy for someone.
